urls.description: ‘Trīs Zvaigžņu balvas’ svinīgā ceremonija notiks 2023.gada 14.janvārī. ‘Trīs Zvaigžņu balvas’ svinīgā ceremonija notiks 2023.gada 14.janvārī. Mēs izmantojam sīkdatnes, lai nodrošinātu labāku mājas lapas lietošanas pieredzi.

data.text: Godinām un atbalstām mūsu sportistus, kuri nes Latvijas vārdu pasaulē! 🇱🇻 airBaltic aicina tevi novērtēt sportistu izcilos sasniegumus, piedaloties Trīs Zvaigžņu balvas tautas balsojumā: https://t.co/AvsEKMWNB4 Balsot iespējams katru dienu līdz pat 28. novembrim. https://t.co/myGGyWjAx1

data.text: airBaltic announces that as of November 15, 2021 its entire active staff, including company’s flying personnel, has vaccinated against Covid-19: https://t.co/4TLeO1rGIK https://t.co/Ki7hE3r5sr

Welcome to #airBalticQuiz! Making content for our followers is one of the best parts of social media team work! 💚
We have been growing and coming up with new ideas on various platforms. What’s the latest social media network airBaltic has joined and been verified in? ✓

Tomorrow November 11th, CEO @Gaussm and SVP HR Alīna Roščina of airBaltic will be joining @simple_flying and AviaDev Future Flying Forum to discuss the airline's experience promoting and maintaining gender diversity in the company. Learn more: https://t.co/XZB0uDF2iu https://t.co/uEsraemtoT

data.text:
Things can only go up from here 🛫

📸 @dslr_spotting https://t.co/3YU51sEkF6

Thank you for participating! These revised values were found in a survey among customers, colleagues, opinion leaders and partners. 

We deliver. We care. We grow. 💚

Working above the clouds – isn’t that great? 🌤 We caught our flying coworker Dženeta on the ground and got a chance to ask her a few questions about her life as a cabin crew. If you dream about taking your career to new heights, join us: https://t.co/7alKVghoAS https://t.co/WEjkjDBkuL

Welcome back to another #airBalticQuiz! Everyone needs values by which they move towards fulfilling their goals and mission.💚 
If you have been closely following our story, you will know that our values are:

Although in aviation autumn months usually mean smaller traffic figures, it is different this year. For the first time ever, we carried more passengers in October than September - 240 300 passengers or 232% more than during the same period last year. https://t.co/2EXBiDssSI https://t.co/xFgKQ0UWSr

data.text: Today we have published our flight schedule for the upcoming summer season that will begin on March 22, 2022. We plan to connect Riga with more than 70 destinations across our network: https://t.co/J2vzKV0vfo https://t.co/qs1SksG1VQ

Each of us has to take steps to make everyday life safe – one of them is wearing a face mask in public. We kindly ask our passengers to act responsibly and wear a face mask during the whole flight to protect their and fellow travelers’ health. https://t.co/C8rHBA3R1i

Whether you are a sworn sun lover or a dedicated fan of white peaks, we will take you to your kind of paradise ☀️❄️Find your ideal winter getaway match for a great price now: https://t.co/r5nAePoEXM
Book 💻 02.11.2021-10.11.2021
Travel ✈️ 16.11.2021-26.03.2022 https://t.co/tflC96SQ34

data.text:
Happy Friday! This #airBalticQuiz we talk about things close to our hearts. And the 💚 of airBaltic is located in Latvia, more precisely at Riga Airport, also known as RIX.
But… what is the other abbreviation (airport code) widely used in aviation for this airport? 🛬

data.text:
Nevari izlemt - #Mājsēde vai #Tālsēde? Šis palīdzēs 😉
✈️ Meklē tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas un pārlaid rudeni droši un saulaini: https://t.co/OkQQzHR1UQ https://t.co/jOdLwwcDFP

We're celebrating 26 years of airBaltic, and we've brought presents! 🎁Shake your phone once a day and win airBaltic Club points, flight e-vouchers and a flight for two to any airBaltic destination: https://t.co/eG5U3Lo1Dy https://t.co/GHV5FJU6uc

Nomaini mājsēdi pret tālsēdi - izvēlies rudeni pavadīt saulaināk!☀️Attālinātais darbs un mācības ir īstais brīdis nomainīt ierasto vidi pret ko eksotiskāku. Šobrīd tiešie lidojumi no Rīgas pieejami par neatvairāmām cenām: https://t.co/OkQQzHR1UQ https://t.co/oXlCAuNxqd
Runway to new adventures and experiences. We are ready to welcome you on board! https://t.co/LAnRT6kVQX
#DidYouKnow that this autumn already the tenth group (consisting of thirteen students) began their professional pilot studies at the Pilot Academy? https://t.co/86oGXGhUuR

Thank you for participating! Majority got it right - many of you were visiting Rhodes! ☀️ It was our top destination this summer season and we are excited to see what the next year brings! Have a great week!

We're honored to announce that today airBaltic received a Livonia Award from Prime Minister of Estonia @kajakallas and Prime Minister of Latvia @krisjaniskarins for being the most successful Latvian company in Estonia: https://t.co/PzCpXeUahR https://t.co/ugKXEvvspV

Another Friday, another #airBalticQuiz! Looking back at our summer season, we can only reminisce about all those happy, tan and well rested people on board with us! ☀️ 
There were so many sunny destinations that people enjoyed, but which of these was the most popular? 🏖

data.text: 14. oktobrī plkst. 13.00 airBaltic neklātienē organizē atvērto durvju dienu, ļaujot interesentiem iepazīties ar stjuarta vakanci. Uzņēmums aicina pievienoties tiešsaistes atlases pasākumam visus interesentus, kuri ir motivēti uzsākt darbu kā stjuarti: https://t.co/JrsEubblBh https://t.co/bMIYynpzlR

For our birthday, airBaltic Pilot Academy performed a unique training flight drawing 26 across the sky and marked the legacy of aviation we will continue going forward. We're incredibly grateful to each of our employees and passengers. Let's fly towards new adventures together!✈️ https://t.co/AUqijXuXAP

data.text: Did you catch that on @flightradar24? 👀✈️ airBaltic Pilot Academy performed a special training flight for our birthday drawing the number 26 across the sky! We're excited to see what the future holds and ready to continue our legacy going forward. Here's to 26! 🎉 https://t.co/E19Q87cbar
For our 26th birthday, airBaltic Pilot Academy has prepared a special gift - keep your eyes on the sky! ✈️ https://t.co/ddIHDEIv7o

After the completion of the 7th and final aircraft delivery in 2021, we have become the largest @Airbus A220-300 operator in the world. airBaltic single type fleet offers unmatched flying experience, comfort, safety and is truly loved by both our crew and passengers. https://t.co/P3cfCNgM0Q

data.text:
Fly to the all-time favourite tourist destination with @airBaltic! ✈️
As of September 27, we are excited to offer new direct flights on the route between Riga and Dubai. Flights between the two cities are planned to be performed four times a week: https://t.co/SCtr06P6yn https://t.co/EkdtS7yv2g
Happy World Tourism Day to all travelers and explorers whose hearts fly to explore new destinations and sights! 💚 https://t.co/aAXJP14Q8d

Yes, yes and yes! Newest destination Kittilä is full of winter charm - holding record for the lowest temperature in Finland, having polar nights in December and let’s not forget the amazing view of Northern lights! ❄️✨
Be sure to check out the direct flights on our website! ✈️

Let’s get down to quizness #airBalticQuiz! With the temperatures dropping, dare to daydream about winter vacation! ⛷
Yesterday we announced new winter destination Kittilä in Finland. Do you know which of these statements are true about the region? ❄️

data.text: An exciting destination in our winter schedule – Kittila in Finland 🇫🇮 Book your flight to enjoy the ultimate mountain fun in 43 slopes, witness breath-taking northern lights or treat your body and soul in real Finnish saunas and steam baths: https://t.co/Fv8VwiJIt1 https://t.co/xItwxqoJj7
#DidYouKnow that since introduction of the Airbus A220-300 in late 2016, airBaltic has carried over 6,5 million passengers on this state-of-art aircraft? https://t.co/M0X9jpQQBe

data.text: We are glad to announce that by summer 2022 airBaltic expects to recruit 320 additional crew – 120 pilots and 200 cabin crew members. It is planned to primarily rehire former pilots and airBaltic Pilot Academy graduates: https://t.co/DOCS6Qsm7q https://t.co/mRqcFAuIen

Travelling is one of the great ways to expand your view of the world and make memories. And we are happy to be the starting point of that journey! ✈️ 
In August 2021 we had 3070 flights and 280 800 passengers 💚 May your travel spirit never ease!

data.text:
Welcome back to our #airBalticQuiz! We are happy to share that travel has been slowly getting back to its old levels! In August 2020 we had 2000 flights and 137 800 passengers. 🛫 
Channel your inner 🤓/🔮 self and let us know below how many flights we had in August 2021?

data.text: This week airBaltic and @Airbus team visited Dublin and Zagreb to present A220-300 aircraft to local media and visitors. We are proud to be ambassadors of this aircraft, delivering the best flying experience to our crew and passengers. https://t.co/zvx4XOh6wc

data.text: By connecting the Baltic region with almost 90 routes across Europe and beyond, we have managed to surpass the number of routes offered during the same period in 2019. Read more: https://t.co/qK1Qxle7Iz https://t.co/J2i3qMtmtl

Welcome aboard YL-ABE - our brand new aircraft delivered to @riga_airport on this very early morning. This is the 6th out of seven planned @Airbus A220-300 aircraft deliveries for us in 2021. Excited to keep providing more connections for our travelers! https://t.co/CIY2fH1GMH

data.text: We are very proud of our six students who have just graduated from @airBaltic Pilot Academy, receiving commercial pilot license upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program. Congratulations on your well-deserved success and landing on such a great career path! https://t.co/p9ORf17qZg

Yesterday airBaltic crew visited @DublinAirport together with @Airbus to represent A220-300 aircraft. We are proud to showcase this state-of-the-art aircraft to visitors being the largest operator of this type. https://t.co/APfzUy7Vf0

data.text: Most of you got it right! Be sure to check out our 8 destinations to Italy - Catania, Naples, Milan, Olbia, Pisa, Rome, Venice, Verona 💚 🇮🇹 Nonetheless, we will be happy to welcome you on board on our 7 destinations to Greece and 6 to Spain as well! ✈️

We are happy to announce that as of now four self-service baggage drop-off points are open at @riga_airport for our passenger convenience. If you have already checked in for a flight and received a boarding pass, you can easily drop off your checked baggage. https://t.co/8N7s7Kr1LY

A father is someone who will lead your life's journey through sunshine and storms. Happy Father's Day to all dads who are the wise, strong, and caring captains of their families! 💚 https://t.co/qFjmQyMHQy

data.text:
Hi! This week #airBalticQuiz is about our route network 🌍
Currently we offer more than 70 destinations for our passengers and some of these countries simply make you daydream about vacations! 😴 🏖
For which country we offer 8 different destinations from Riga?

Nearly five years ago we were the launch operator of @Airbus A220-300, and until today we've grown into the largest A220-300 operator in the world. Learn more of this success story shared by @airBaltic President & CEO @Gaussm. https://t.co/NpQrjEQLyl

data.text: With each passing month we see that the demand for travel continues to grow. During August 2021, @airBaltic has carried 280 800 passengers – 104% more than in the same period last year and 34% more than July 2021. Read more: https://t.co/x2Ng46HFfZ https://t.co/f82Zn4VJnC

data.text: Today at 13:32 our CEO @Gaussm will be joining @CAPA_Aviation to discuss airBaltic experience operating in 2021 and to share the company’s future outlook. Register and listen to the #CAPALive virtual event here: https://t.co/KhHwOfMdyo https://t.co/Mc4RkvlJng

#DidYouKnow that the quality of cabin air on our @Airbus A220 – 300 aircraft is carefully controlled and is recirculated with ventilation rates that provide a total change of air 20 - 30 times per hour? https://t.co/43IGrAezlT

data.text: Take a look at our first flight to the idyllic island of Tenerife that offers diverse leisure options for both holidaymakers and explorers. As of September, this dream destination is one direct flight away from Riga, available three times per week ✈️ https://t.co/nbF21DQky6 https://t.co/dFcRIXAdJe

Thank you for participating! Tenerife is indeed our longest (and furthest) flight….for now 😏 
The ✈️ takes 6 hours 40 minutes and travels 4511 km, but do not worry - times flies when you’re on board with us!

We believe the best vacations start with flying @Airbus A220-300! 💚 We're proud our fleet consists solely of this aircraft type. Take a virtual tour, and learn more about one of the world’s greenest commercial aircraft in the sky: https://t.co/iXyWckM88H https://t.co/3KoNcwNqLl

data.text:
Happy Friday! #airBalticQuiz is here and so are our flights to Tenerife! Yesterday we had our first flight and let us tell you - it was magical! 🌴✨
True of false that it is currently the longest route we are performing?

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends

data.text: Ar prieku paziņojam, ka no 2. septembra esam sākuši lidojumus uz idillisko un ar brīnišķu dabu apveltīto Tenerifi. Dodies kopā ar mums baudīt sauli un karstas pludmales visu ziemas sezonu: https://t.co/ZPdRAYEpVD https://t.co/raM5DRzoFq

Baltic Outlook September issue is available on board of our flights! Enjoy our story about Tenerife, an island of never-ending spring, or learn more about the gorgeous French actress @OfficialMarceau in an exclusive interview. Digital version available 👉 https://t.co/8HNJ47VvmU https://t.co/iHePrXBjzA

#DidYouKnow that our Information Systems Department have a broad span of responsibilities – starting from ensuring user support to employees and analyzing data to answer such questions as “How many pets were transported last year”? https://t.co/XTBtw4uDux

airBaltic's new #NFT collection is live! Edition 5 NFTs are showcasing Bauska #cryptoart and have been issued on OpenSea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether. A total of 10 new unique collectibles can be purchased now: https://t.co/YjsB3Jnyyr https://t.co/3T1UyRStix
